description:
Starts a new session for the user executing this command.
The session ID which is returned by this command can be used as the value for the HTTP API parameter 's_session'. Using 's_session' in the HTTP API replaces the otherwise mandatory authentication parameters 's_login' and 's_password'.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: The respective session type, default is API
Defines the number of seconds of inactivity, until a session expires. (min = 60, max = 3600, default = 600)
Defines the maximum lifetime of a session in seconds. (min = 60 , max = 86400, default = 86400)
